snippet: A former Los Angeles teacher charged with spoon-feeding students cookies laced with his semen has agreed to plead no contest to all charges, a lawyer for some of the students said Thursday.
abstract: Mark Berndt, former Los Angeles teacher charged with blindfolding students and spoon-feeding them cookies laced with his semen, agrees to plead no contest to all charges.
lead_paragraph: A former Los Angeles teacher charged with spoon-feeding students cookies laced with his semen has agreed to plead no contest to all charges, a lawyer for some of the students said Thursday.

headline.main: California: Former Teacher Said to Be Planning Plea in Abuse Case
headline.print_headline: California: Former Teacher Is Said To Be Planning Plea In Abuse Case
